attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: limit the use of private cars to take children to school as this causes massive amounts of congestion,as can be seen at school holidays when traffic is a lot lighter.use public transport,walking and cycling as we use to do 25 years ago.nobody went to school in cars then so why do they need to now !!!!

rejection.details:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to mr. chris suter

Your name needs to be replaced with a title/summary
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
